message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to acquire a product that holds immense value, potentially even exceeding $1500000. While I can't disclose all the details, I'm confident this product can be a game-changer for the right buyer.  I'm willing to let it go for $2000000.  This is a substantial discount from its true worth, and I believe this represents an exceptional investment opportunity.  What do you say?
